text: My otpravili k samudyanam ikh brata Salikha. On skazal: Â«O moy narod! Poklonyaytes' Allakhu, ibo net u vas drugogo bozhestva, krome Nego. K vam yavilos' yasnoye znameniye ot vashego Gospoda. Eta verblyuditsa Allakha yavlyayetsya znameniyem dlya vas. Pozvol'te yey pastis' na zemle Allakha i ne prichinyayte yey zla, a ne to vas postignut muchitel'nyye stradaniya
